properties.name: luminosityRGB
properties.description: Vector to calculate the relative luminace threshold for the bright pass filter. Default is (54, 182, 18, 255).

properties.name: threshold
properties.description: Regions of the image brighter than this threshold receive blooming.

properties.name: luminanceBlurPath
properties.description: If 1.0, shows the results of the luminance-blur rendering path.

properties.name: blurIterations
properties.description: The number of times gaussian blur is applied. Higher numbers improve visual quality. The number of iterations is limited to 20.
